value.title: Is This a Good Time to Become a Power BI Consultant? Really? ü§î
value.excerpt: Is this really a good time to become a Power BI Consultant? value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI
value.excerpt: If you use SQL Server Analysis Services as a data source for Power BI, you have two types of connection; Live Connection or Import Data.
